about_the_game:
Welcome to the Season Pass of *NEW* SCUFFED EPIC BHOP SIMULATOR 2023 (POG CHAMP), with 4 Maps at launch of Year 1, 2 new maps are getting added every month for season pass holders.

Introducing new maps such as Abandoned, and more community designed maps to be added to the pass,

Additionally, Season Pass members will eventually be able to play more multiplayer maps that are exclusive to the DLC, that non season pass members will not be able to access.
detailed_description:
Welcome to the Season Pass of *NEW* SCUFFED EPIC BHOP SIMULATOR 2023 (POG CHAMP), with 4 Maps at launch of Year 1, 2 new maps are getting added every month for season pass holders.

Introducing new maps such as Abandoned, and more community designed maps to be added to the pass,

Additionally, Season Pass members will eventually be able to play more multiplayer maps that are exclusive to the DLC, that non season pass members will not be able to access.

short_description: Welcome to the Season Pass of *NEW* SCUFFED EPIC BHOP SIMULATOR 2023 (POG CHAMP), with 4 Maps at launch of Year 1. Introducing new maps such as Abandoned, and more community designed maps to be added to the pass, the pass also comes with free multiplayer maps exclusive to the holders.
